password-reset-view.label: Reset your password
password-reset-view.help-text: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
password-reset-view.alert-after-send: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If it doesn't appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.

sign-up-view.label: Sign up
sign-up-view.name: Name
sign-up-view.alert-after-create: Please check your email and verify your email address.
